products.title: Cheesy Pizza
products.description: A classic favorite loaded with gooey mozzarella and cheddar cheese on a golden crust — pure cheesy bliss!

products.title: Loaded Burger
products.description: Juicy beef patty stacked high with melted cheese, crispy lettuce, and tangy sauce — the ultimate hunger crusher!

products.title: Spicy Biryani
products.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender chicken and fiery spices — every bite bursts with flavor.

products.title: French Fries
products.description: Crispy golden fries sprinkled with salt — the perfect crunchy sidekick to any meal.

products.title: Sushi Platter
products.description: An elegant assortment of fresh sushi rolls with delicate fish, rice, and seaweed perfection.

products.title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
products.description: Smoky BBQ chicken, onions, and cheese melted on a crispy crust — a bold twist on the classic.

products.title: Four Cheese Pizza
products.description: A heavenly blend of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and blue cheese — creamy, rich, and irresistible.

products.title: Peri Peri Chicken Pizza
products.description: Fiery peri peri chicken layered with melted cheese and spicy sauce — perfect for heat lovers!

products.title: Zinger Burger
products.description: Crispy fried chicken fillet with creamy mayo and lettuce — crunchy, juicy, and unforgettable.

products.title: Mushroom Swiss Burger
products.description: Savory grilled mushrooms and Swiss cheese on a juicy patty — a rich, earthy delight.

products.title: Veggie Supreme Burger
products.description: Loaded with fresh veggies, cheese, and zesty sauce — a wholesome treat for vegetarians.

products.title: Bacon Beef Burger
products.description: Thick beef patty topped with crispy bacon and smoky cheese — a carnivore’s dream come true.

products.title: Mutton Biryani
products.description: Slow-cooked mutton and fragrant rice infused with rich spices — the king of biryanis.

products.title: Malabar Chicken Biryani
products.description: Authentic Kerala-style biryani with tender chicken and ghee-roasted spices — aromatic and flavorful.

products.title: Veg Biryani
products.description: Fragrant basmati rice with fresh vegetables and mild spices — light, flavorful, and satisfying.

products.title: Dragon Roll
products.description: Avocado-topped eel and cucumber roll that delivers a smoky, creamy, and fresh flavor punch.

products.title: Salmon Roll
products.description: Fresh salmon with sticky rice and seaweed — simple, elegant, and melt-in-your-mouth good.

products.title: Mozzarella Sticks
products.description: Crispy on the outside, gooey on the inside — these mozzarella sticks are cheese perfection.

products.title: Tacos Trio
products.description: Three tacos filled with your choice of meat or veggies — fresh, zesty, and packed with flavor.

products.title: Grilled Corn
products.description: Char-grilled corn brushed with butter and herbs — smoky, juicy, and full of flavor.

products.title: Lemon Mojito
products.description: Refreshing mint, lemon, and soda blend — the perfect cool-down drink on any hot day.

products.title: Mango Smoothie
products.description: Sweet ripe mangoes blended into a creamy, tropical smoothie — sunshine in a glass.

products.title: Oreo Milkshake
products.description: A creamy shake loaded with crushed Oreos — chocolatey, thick, and totally irresistible.

products.title: Blueberry Cheesecake
products.description: Smooth cheesecake topped with a rich blueberry compote — sweet, tangy, and melt-in-your-mouth.
